thread.title: Emily Ward

author: Emily Ward
title: Emily Ward
text: Joining Trusted Housesitters is a great way to meet furry new friends whilst having a very cheap and easy way to set yourself up with accommodation on the road. It takes a while to get your first couple of housesits but once you get some references it should be much easier! There are far more housesits available on this website than most or all of the other housesitting websites I've seen, I've had much more luck with this than with Housesitters UK - my only qualm is the membership fee is quite steep especially in comparison with these other websites.
